Deerhaven Conservation Area

Hours

Half an hour past sunrise to half an hour past sunset. Sunrise Time , Sunset Time

Size

17.0 Acres, Trails 0.1 miles, 0.2 km

Property Owner

Groton Conservation Commission

Links

Official Conservation Commission Page

Trail Maintenance

Volunteers and the Groton Trails Committee. Please email trails@townofgroton.org to report problems or volunteer.

Description

Deerhaven Conservation Area has a small connecting trail between Deerfield Drive and Lowell Road. There is no off street parking.

Map

Click/Press map for detailed view.

Please send us your photos of the Deerhaven Conservation Area!
